column1:
Required. Use utm_source to identify a search engine, newsletter name, or other source.
Example: utm_source=google
column2:
Required. Use utm_source to identify a search engine, newsletter name, or other source.
Example: utm_source=google

column1:
Required. Use utm_medium to identify a medium such as email or cost-per- click
Example: utm_medium=cpc
column2:
Required. Use utm_medium to identify a medium such as email or cost-per- click
Example: utm_medium=cpc

column1:
Required. Used for keyword analysis. Use utm_campaign to identify a specific product promotion or strategic campaign.
Example: utm_campaign=spring_sale
column2:
Required. Used for keyword analysis. Use utm_campaign to identify a specific product promotion or strategic campaign.
Example: utm_campaign=spring_sale

column1:
Used for paid search. Use utm_term to note the keywords for this ad.
Example: utm_term=running+shoes
column2:
Used for paid search. Use utm_term to note the keywords for this ad.
Example: utm_term=running+shoes

column1:
Used for A/B testing and content-targeted ads. Use utm_content to differentiate ads or links that point to the same URL.
Example: utm_content=logolink or utm_content=textlink
column2:
Used for A/B testing and content-targeted ads. Use utm_content to differentiate ads or links that point to the same URL.
Example: utm_content=logolink or utm_content=textlink

column1:
Autumn has come bringing our AUTUMN SALE!
Now’s a good time to have a fresh start with new products by Our Company without skimping on your budget.
As always, thank you for your business and the confidence you have placed in us!
column2:

column1:
We know this is a busy time of year, but let us draw your mind from the fuss for a second.
We’ve just launched our CHRISTMAS SALE!
So, hurry up to spoil yourself with new purchases in the year ending.
And good luck in the coming year!
As always, thank you for your business and the confidence you have placed in us!
